txt.en:
'Jajax, can it be you? And what are you doing with this [placeholder]? Have you lost your edge, brother?'

Jajax and Daxamat laugh and the two men share a brief embrace. Jajax explains your unconventional friendship to Daxamat before asking why he's tending the stables in Hata Kebir.

'As you can see, I am no longer so favoured amongst the Heirs, but I think the horses have grown to appreciate me. Still... why have you come here?'
Jajax is desperate to find his brother in Hata Kebir and hopes to free him from the misguided rule of the Heirs of Castamir.
Jajax's brother can be found somewhere in Hata Kebir.\n\nJajax has begged your aid in finding his brother who he believes is among the forces at Hata Kebir.

'There is another matter I have been hesitant to share, [placeholder]. I believe my brother is here among these men, and be it selfishness or sentiment, I want to help him be free from these men before he meets with some grim fate.

'We were separated when our fleet split, you see, for he has long been a favoured deckhand of the Scourge. I did not seek to deny him the honour of serving on such a ship, but now... I wish him to be as far away from the Scourge and his brothers as he can.

'Let us search for him, and then leave this place.'
